messages.title: Fighting against Hard Brexit
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union, and that’s why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.

messages.title: Better Public Transport
messages.content: Cardiff can only grow and thrive if a proper public transport system is in place. The Labour Government announced plans for a South Wales Metro back in 2012. It’s now 2017 and we’re still waiting.

We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.
Cardiff can only grow and thrive if a proper public transport system is in place. The Labour Government announced plans for a South Wales Metro back in 2012. It’s now 2017 and we’re still waiting.
